tag_list: flaunt-agency, autobytel, alcone-marketing-group, greenculture, operations, information-technology, marketing
overview:
Lance St.Clair is an Operations Manager for Quest Drape and Co-founder of Flaunt Agency, LLC based out of Las Vegas, Nevada.

Lance has over 15 years experience in B2B/B2C operations, Information Technology, Customer Support. His strength lies completely on his determination to get the job done. He quotes, “You never tell a client you cannot do something. You figure it out, and you get it done. It’s that simple”. For almost the past 10 years, Lance has focused his attention for E-Commerce companies. While working for Alcone Marketing Group / Omnicom Group (NYSE: OMC), he managed online promotional websites for eBay, Nextel, DaimlerChrysler, Kia, Sun Microsystems, Siemens, BAX Global, and IHOP. Prior to Alcone, he managed marketing services for Autobytel.com (NasdaqNM: ABTL).

Lance currently resides in Las Vegas, Nevada with his wife, Kimberly. He’s actively a dedicated marathon runner and pursuing his first Ironman Triathlon.
